name: My Dope Project

mobileSwitcherItems.description: Select or customize your tip amount
Enter your room number or staff person's name
Chose payment method and confirm tip

features.title: Convenient
features.description: Available on Apple App Store or Google Play

features.title: Simple
features.description: Integrates with your payroll system to disburse the tips.

features.title: Marketing Support
features.description: Marketing Tool kit to promote TipYo at your property.

features.title: Safe & Secure
features.description: TipYo partners with Stripe for your credit card processing.

gettingStarted: Subscribe to TipYo Mobile Tipping Service.
We will provide a link for you to create an account with our credit card processing partner, Stripe.
Your property will be added to the TipYo App along with the services that can be tipped.
We will provide you with a Marketing tool kit to promote TipYo to guests.
When guests tip, the money is deposited into your Stripe Account.
TipYo will work with your payroll so you can disburse the tips to your associates.
